---
title: "Exploring the data"
output: html_notebook
---








```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(zoo)

testing_data <- nhs_data_joined1 %>% 
  select(quarter, specialty_name, length_of_stay) %>% 
  mutate(quarter = parse_date_time(quarter, orders = "%Y%q"))

testing_data %>% 
  filter(quarter > 0) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(quarter)) %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x = quarter, y = length_of_stay)+
  geom_line()
```
